Name: Epic Roller Coasters
About the game: In Epic Roller Coasters you'll get the same feeling of a real roller coaster with a high level graphics, physics-based simulation. You'll go up and down seeing everything around you with our long range vision capabilities! Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR and SynthesisVR
